title: Episode 13 -  The Bears Are Back In Town
itunes:title: The Bears Are Back In Town
description: Frank talks to Rich Suttmeier from Valuengine.com and Tom Dyson. Both are very bearish on the markets although Rich sees a short-term rally. Then oil guru Chuck Marvin explains why refining is a great business for the majors.
content:encoded: Frank talks to Rich Suttmeier from Valuengine.com and Tom Dyson. Both are very bearish on the markets although Rich sees a short-term rally. Then oil guru Chuck Marvin explains why refining is a great business for the majors.
